testcase.name: findPostingColumn should give the exact column where it exists
findPostingColumn should be null when a column is not found
findPostingColumn should give the column if has forPosting set with that field name
findPostingColumn should not give column if Table has no alias for writing
findPostingColumn should not give the column if has forPosting set with a different name
findPostingColumn should give the column if has forPosting set with same name
